channel.title: Buying items NOT in stores! URGENT! [PI]
channel.description:
I don't know if you guys know this but there is a memory editor called Cheat Engine and people are using it on on PI sources to buy any item in the shops.
Here is someone's youtube video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MHDm8sCXGrE
I was wondering how to fix this so this can't happen on my source because it works atm on mine. If anyone can help me that would be great!

lets see if this works…
if it does , then PI has no more use…
